Parent element has styles background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) none repeat scroll 0% 0% / auto padding-box border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-style: normal; text-decoration: none, while anchor has styles background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) none repeat scroll 0% 0% / auto padding-box border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-style: normal; text-decoration: none. Change the styles to differentiate between them.
